source:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Riott seems eager to share the customs of Tomra.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
トメラの村のリオットは、冒険者が珍しいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_TODO_00<tab>Slay Scree gnomes and obtain gnome soulstones.
target: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2215101 /var>を討伐し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCE01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the gnome soulstones to Riott.
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_TODO_02<tab>Use the bottles of Tomran stonebrew on Zigutt's statue.

TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_000<tab>Lali-ho! Well, dent my helm with a knocker's arse! We've got ourselves a visitor─a <var 09 E948 ((stranger)) ((stranger)) ((strange dwarf)) ((stranger)) ((stranger)) ((stranger)) ((stranger)) ((stranger)) /var> from a strange land!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_000<tab>ラリホー！　こりゃたまげた！
おめさん、<var 09 E948 ((ヨソから来た旅人でねぇか！)) ((ヨソから来た旅人でねぇか！)) ((ヨソから来たっていう変なドワーフでねぇか！)) ((ヨソから来た旅人でねぇか！)) ((ヨソから来た旅人でねぇか！)) ((ヨソから来た旅人でねぇか！)) ((ヨソから来た旅人でねぇか！)) ((ヨソから来た旅人でねぇか！)) /var>
こんなトコまで、よく来たなぁ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_001<tab>If I'm to welcome you properly to Tomra, then I'd best be teachin' you our ways, eh? And that starts with payin' respects to Zigutt's statue!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_001<tab>せっかくこの村に来たからにゃ、
おめさんの脳ミソに、「ジグット」を刻み込まんといかん！
「ジグットの石像」に表敬訪問してくといいでな！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_002<tab>...Ah, you wouldn't know your Riotts from your Ronitts, would you? The “Zigutt” I'm referrin' to is one of our ancestral chiefs─the mightiest warrior in Tholl history! You remember that name, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_002<tab>ん、ヨソモンは知らんで当然だ！
「ジグット」は、歴代最強と謳われるドワーフの戦士にして、
先々代の最長老のこと……よぉく覚えとき！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_004<tab>Now, first things first, we need to prepare the offering. That involves you bringin' me a couple of soulstones from them rock-headed gnomes out in Scree. Try not to get flattened, eh?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_004<tab>さ、まずは捧げ物の用意だ！
スクリー山地にいる<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2215101 /var>を倒して、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCE01 /var>」を2つとってきてちょ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_005<tab>First off, we need two soulstones! You've got to take 'em from Scree gnomes, and let me tell you: they ain't goin' to cooperate!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_005<tab>さ、まずは捧げ物の用意だ！
スクリー山地にいる<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2215101 /var>を倒して、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCE01 /var>」を2つとってきてちょ！
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_010<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCE01 /var>」を2つ、オラに渡してちょ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_011<tab>Now, I'll just get my hammer out here and...<crunch>...ever so delicately...<crack>...grind these into powder!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_011<tab>よしよし、じゃあこれをこうして…………
バキバキのコナゴナにして…………パッパっと！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_012<tab>And there we have it! Some lovely bottles of stonebrew, seasoned with a sprinkling of gnomish soulstone!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_012<tab>ほい、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCF01 /var>」、いっちょあがり！
この村で造った地酒に、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCE01 /var>を砕いて入れたもんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_013<tab>It's the soulstone what puts the “stone” in the brew. I mean, how else do you expect a statue to drink it!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_013<tab>死んで石像になったジグットは、酒が飲めねだろ？
だが、こうして「石酒」にすりゃ、石像も酒が呑めんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_014<tab>Now for the ceremonial bit. You take these bottles, and empty 'em onto the four sides of Zigutt's statue over there. Every last drop, mind you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_014<tab>そんじゃ、おめさんにゃ掟通りにやってもらおう。
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCF01 /var>」を、土台の周囲を巡るように、
四方に撒いてきてちょ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_015<tab>What are you waitin' for? Zigutt must be as parched as a squid in the desert after standin' in that square day after day!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_015<tab>そんじゃ、おめさんにゃ掟通りにやってもらおう。
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCF01 /var>」を、土台の周囲を巡るように、
四方に撒いてきてちょ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>As you pour the stonebrew onto the base of the statue, you almost believe you see a smile flickering across its impassive face...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_SYSTEM_000_020<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FCF01 /var>を撒いてから、ふと見上げると、
石像のジグットが微笑んでいるような気がした……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_031<tab>You may have noticed, but we Tholls like a drink or two. And seein' the great Zigutt unable to hoist a tankard on account of him bein' a stone statue brings a tear to the eye. And so we honor his memory with the brew he loved best.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_031<tab>ドワーフは、みんな大酒のみ。
石像になって、大好きな酒が飲めなくなっちゃあ、気の毒だろ？
だから、こういう表敬の方法が掟に記されてんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_032<tab>He was chief of the Tholl during the coming of the Flood─a true dwarf among dwarves! It was him what ousted that bastard Warrior of Light, and brought our people together in a time when division meant death!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_032<tab>ジグットは、「光の氾濫」の前後に最長老だったドワーフで、
大罪人「光の戦士」を追放したのも、彼だそうだ。
未曾有の危機に、みんなをまとめあげ、一族を生き延びさせた！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_033<tab>Aye, we wouldn't be here now if it weren't for Zigutt. And I thank you for showin' him the proper respect!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_033<tab>とにかく、どえりゃあドワーフなんだ！
今のオラたちがあるのは、ジグットのおかげ。
おめさんも、オラたちの掟に従ってくれてありがとな！
